meanings.definition: The act of imparting or infusing something into someone or something.
meanings.sent1: Her imbuements of kindness and compassion made her a beloved figure in the community.
meanings.sent2: The teacher's imbuements of knowledge and wisdom greatly benefited the students.
meanings.sent3: The imbuements of humor and wit in the play had the audience laughing throughout.
meanings.sent4: His imbuements of creativity and innovation transformed the company's approach to problem-solving.
meanings.sent5: The imbuements of courage and determination in the hero inspired everyone around.

meanings.definition: The qualities or characteristics that have been instilled or infused into someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The imbuements of honesty and integrity were evident in his every action.
meanings.sent2: The imbuements of patience and perseverance helped her overcome every obstacle.
meanings.sent3: The imbuements of clumsiness and forgetfulness in the character added a comedic touch to the story.
meanings.sent4: The imbuements of warmth and kindness in her smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The imbuements of elegance and grace in her movements captivated all who watched.
